# canBeConverted(to:)

**Instance Method**

Indicates whether the measurement can be converted to the given unit.

## Declaration

```swift
func canBeConverted(to unit: Unit) -> Bool
```

## Converting to Other Units

- **converting(to:)**: Returns a measurement created by converting the receiver to the specified unit.
